word_letter_focus.title: Grammar: Negatives
word_letter_focus.directions: Read each sentence. Then highlight the word indicated before each sentence.

sentence.text: Choose the negative: {wh}Nobody{/wh} laughed at the comedian’s jokes.
Choose the negative: “I’m just {wh}not{/wh} funny tonight,” he thought.
Choose the negative: He {wh}couldn’t{/wh} even get a chuckle from the audience.
Choose the negative: “It must be them,” the comedian decided, and {wh}never{/wh} played in that theater again.
Choose the negative: “I {wh}can’t{/wh} find my gloves,” my Dad said.
Choose the negative: {wh}"Neither{/wh} can I,” I said.
Choose the negative: We’d {wh}hardly{/wh} spoken when Mom found our gloves in the closet.
Choose the negative: “You two {wh}scarcely{/wh} looked, which is why you {wh}couldn’t{/wh} find them,” she said.
Choose the negative: Jesse could think of {wh}nothing{/wh} he wanted to do.
Choose the negative: He had {wh}nowhere{/wh} to go, and he had {wh}nobody{/wh} to hang out with.
Choose the negative: Besides that, he was tired and did {wh}not{/wh} want to go out that night.
Choose the negative: He had {wh}barely{/wh} started watching television when he fell fast asleep.
Choose the negative: Some people are {wh}not{/wh} able to fall asleep easily.
Choose the negative: They {wh}never{/wh} seem to get enough sleep at night.
Choose the negative: If you want to fall asleep, {wh}don’t{/wh} eat a lot of food before bedtime.
Choose the negative: {wh}Neither{/wh} should you watch television in bed.
Choose the negative that doesn’t belong: I couldn’t {wh}never{/wh} fall asleep that night.
Choose the negative that doesn’t belong: I tried counting sheep, but it was {wh}not{/wh} no help.
Choose the negative that doesn’t belong: I read, but couldn’t {wh}hardly{/wh} keep my eyes open.
Choose the negative that doesn’t belong: I couldn’t {wh}not{/wh} get to sleep again.
The negative that doesn’t belong: Many people do not {wh}never{/wh} get enough sleep.
The negative that doesn’t belong: Six hours or less is hardly {wh}nowhere{/wh} enough for adults.
The negative that doesn’t belong: You can’t {wh}not{/wh} function well with so little sleep.
